Container.Name: Onlyoffice
Container.Overview:
ONLYOFFICE Docs is an online office suite comprising viewers and editors for texts, spreadsheets and presentations, fully compatible with Office Open XML formats: .docx, .xlsx, .pptx and enabling collaborative editing in real time.
Functionality - Document Editor - Spreadsheet Editor - Presentation Editor - Mobile web viewers - Collaborative editing - Hieroglyph support Support for all the popular formats: DOC, DOCX, TXT, ODT, RTF, ODP, EPUB, ODS, XLS, XLSX, CSV, PPTX, HTML
You can specify port 80 for http or port 443 for https.

Config.Name: HTTP/s port
Config.Description: TCP http port 80 or https port 443

Config.Name: User ID
Config.Description: User ID the container will be run with.

Config.Name: Group ID
Config.Description: Group ID the container will be run with.
